page.title: 15A stanger to Hazelbury Bryan
page.content: Life in Hazelbury Bryan is very different from London in many ways. The population in London is very,dense but here it is very scattered. The school in London is very large. It has 310 pupils and 13 classes, but in Hazelbury Bryan school there are just 75 pupils and 3 classes. My friends in London are more fashion concious than children in Hazelbury Bryan. They are into pop music and amusement arcades in London and usualy get into trouble very often. the style of the buildings in London is much more modern than the thatched cottages in Hazelbury Bryan. Many people in London have to have tripple-glazed windows because of the noise and the traffic pollution. I'd never seen lichens before coming to Hazelbury Bryan.
